text: The first officer of the National Assembly of Hungary () is the deputy of the Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary. The current First Officer is Márta Mátrai. ==First officers of the National Assembly of Hungary== {|class="wikitable" !Name !Entered office !Left office !Political Party |- !colspan="5" style="background-color: lightgrey;"|National Assembly |- |Aladár Lukovich |18 February 1920 |1922 | |- |Jenő Karafiáth |1922 |28 January 1927 |EP |- !colspan="5" style="background-color: lightgrey;"|House of Magnates |- | Endre Rakovszky | 1927 || 1939 || Independent |- | Lajos Szapáry | 1939 || 1944 || Independent |- | Aladár Krüger | 1944 || 1945 || NYKP |- !colspan="5" style="background-color: lightgrey;"|House of Representatives |- | Jenő Karafiáth | 1927 || 1931 || EP |- | Móric Putnoky | 1931 || 1944 || EP |- | János Halmay | 1944 || 1945 || NYKP |- !colspan="5" style="background-color: lightgrey;"|National Assembly |- | István Vásáry | 1945|| 1946 || FKGP |- | László Révész | 1946 || 1947 || FKGP |- | Ferenc Szeder | 1947 || 1948 || MSZDP |- | Illésné Mónus | 1948 || 1949|| MSZDP |} === Since 2013 === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- !Name !Entered office !Left office !Political Party |- !colspan="5" style="background-color: lightgrey;"|A Magyar Országgyűlés háznagya |- | Márta Mátrai | 2013 || Incumbent || Fidesz |} Category:Lists of legislative speakers in Hungary
title: List of first officers of the National Assembly (Hungary)
